concept.title: 5344.201-1 Consent requirements

conbody.p: (a) For SMC, when the contract is a space program contract (See DAFFARS 5302 ), contracting officers shall, pursuant to MP5309.190 and SMC Class Deviation of FAR clause 52.244-2 , Subcontracts, include the Attachment 1 clause of the class deviation in full text.
